# The `HardwareLoops.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Insert hardware loop intrinsics into loops which are deemed profitable by the target, by querying <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Insert hardware loop intrinsics into loops which are deemed profitable by the target, by querying <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a>.

A hardware loop comprises of two intrinsics: one, outside the loop, to set the loop iteration count and another, in the exit block, to decrement the counter. The decremented value can either be carried through the loop via a phi or handled in some opaque way by the target.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return true if the search should stop, which will be when an inner loop is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// converted and the parent loop doesn&#39;t support containing a hardware loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HardwareLoopsImpl::TryConvertLoop(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Ctx) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Process nested loops first.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AnyChanged = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;SL : &#42;L)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal">    AnyChanged |= TryConvertLoop(SL, Ctx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AnyChanged) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hardwareloops-cpp-/#aae269bc7f800ec24fb92133d830f4764">reportHWLoopFailure</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;nested hardware-loops not supported&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;HWLoopNested&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="normal">                        ORE, L);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Stop search.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hardwareloopinfo">HardwareLoopInfo</a> HWLoopInfo(L);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ExitCount-&gt;getType()-&gt;isPointerTy() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">  ExitCount = SE.getAddExpr(ExitCount, SE.getOne(CountType));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we&#39;re trying to use the &#39;test and set&#39; form of the intrinsic, we need</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
